I often want to share what I can do with the available technology.
Paste this data uri into the address bar Google Chrome 43+, Safari 7/iOS Safari 7.1, or desktop Opera 27+. For die hard Firefox fans(31+), it looks like you will need to tweek some settings and enable the media.webspeech.synth.enabled about:config flag.
data:text/html;base64,

I know that Facebook doesn't like copy/paste code into the javascript console, but this is different. Standard browser security precautions prevent any web page without an actual domain or ip address from using the more risky functions, such as local storage, cookies, or internet communication other than loading outside scripts. Data uris like the one above are no more harmful than html documents on your desktop.
